    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    HasKnownLength
    Describes something that can return its exact length without additional computation (i.e., without resorting to something like toString().length()).
    interface 
    HasLength
    Describes something that can return its exact length.
    interface 
    HasMinimumLength
    Describes something that can return its minimum length.
    interface 
    StringHolder
    A StringHolder holds something that can eventually turn into a string.
